title: Zeitaroni 8/28: RNC, Jim Gaffigan, Lincoln Memorial, Bill and Ted
itunes:title: Zeitaroni 8/28: RNC, Jim Gaffigan, Lincoln Memorial, Bill and Ted
description:
On this edition of Zeitaroni (the San Francisco treat) Jack and Miles discuss the highly illegal and dangerous closer to the RNC, Jim Gaffigan went off on Trump zealots on Twitter, it's the 57th anniversary of the Dr King's address from the Lincoln Memorial, and apparently Bill and Ted 3 is pretty not bad!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
